abstract.t: LDAP is the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol, defined in [1],[2] and [3]. This document describes a format for an LDAP UniformResource Locator. The format describes an LDAP search operation toperform to retrieve information from an LDAP directory, or, in thecontext of an LDAPv3 referral or reference, the format describes aservice where an LDAP operation may be progressed.
